overview: Hot blue eyed blonde Brandon Wilde is excited to meet his older sister's new boy toy (Calvin Banks). But when they meet up for drinks at Brandon's place, Brandon's hot boyfriend (Billie Ramos) instantly recognizes Calvin as a former one night stand. When Billie goes out of town to see his family, Brandon rents Calvin a room in his house, behind Billie's back. As sexual tension grows between sexy, hung Calvin and his girlfriend's brother, Billie comes home early and things get real. Forbidden lust runs amok in this sexy, intense film starring some of today's hottest adult film stars.
title: His Sister's Lover 2
